overview: "One monotonous day is followed by another monotonous, unchanging day". Unfiltered information is written inside us and shouts "I am heard" in the deafening silence of the unconscious. Life on shutdown. Sometimes all you need is to close your eyes and stop yelling. You will see another dimension. It won't be a dream, it will be your reality. And it can change your life. The film was made in the context of the 5th Panorama Film School of the Aristotle University of Thessaloniki with the theme DEACTIVATION.
title: HYPAR
